item.title: Boulevardier
item.description: Ingredients 45 ml bourbon or rye whisky 15 ml Campari 15 ml sweet vermouth orange twist Instructions Stir ingredients. Serve in rocks glass on ice. Garnish with orange twist.

item.title: Manhattan
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml rye whisky or bourbon 20 ml sweet vermouth 4 dashes aromatic bitters cherry Instructions Stir ingredients. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

item.title: Old fashioned
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml rye whisky or bourbon 5 ml sugar syrup 4 dashes aromatic bitters orange or lemon twist Instructions Stir ingredients. Serve in a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with a twist.

item.title: Paper plane
item.description: Ingredients 20ml bourbon 20ml Aperol 20ml Amaro Nonino or Montenegro 20ml lemon juice lemon twist Instructions Shake ingredients. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist (or miniature paper plane).

item.title: Saratoga
item.description: Ingredients 30 ml brandy 30 ml rye whisky or bourbon 30 ml sweet vermouth 2 dashes aromatic bitters orange twist Instructions Stir ingredients. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist.

item.title: Whiskey sour
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml bourbon 30 ml lemon juice 15 ml sugar syrup 4 dashes orange bitters 1/2 egg white (optional) cherry orange twist Instructions Dry shake ingredients. Then shake with ice and double strain. Serve in a rocks glass over fresh ice. Garnish with orange twist and cherry.
